description: A unit test file for the input handling logic in an Android app, testing whether the send button is enabled or disabled based on input text.

classes.name: test_InputHandlingLogicTest
classes.description: A test class that verifies input handling rules for enabling or disabling a send button based on the text input.

methods.name: canSend
methods.description: A private utility method that returns true if the input text is non-null and not blank; used to determine if sending is permitted.

methods.name: blankInput_disablesSend
methods.description: A test method verifying that null, empty, whitespace, and newline inputs disable the send button.

methods.name: nonBlank_enablesSend
methods.description: A test method verifying that non-blank inputs enable the send button.
